body_html: FYI, we recently added custom protobuf pip packages that should overcome the 64MiB limit and also provide fast processing in python: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#protobuf-library-related-issues
